hero.intro: Hi, I am a web developer who enjoys delivering creative and high-quality digital solutions to meet your business needs.

about.title: About Me
about.desc: Hello, my name is Nazal Gusti Prastya and I reside in Bogor, Indonesia. At 18 years old, I am a student of Information Systems and a web developer. Beyond writing code, I consider myself a creative thinker, adept problem solver, and enthusiastic self-learner passionate about delving into the endless possibilities of technology. My current focus lies in website development utilizing Laravel, React.js, and Next.js. I am keen on exploring opportunities for collaboration. Should you be interested in working together or discussing potential projects, please feel free to reach out to me.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: I have worked in several companies as a professional web developer.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore a Collection of My Varied and Creative Works

contact.title: Let's Talk a project together
contact.subtitle: My inbox is always open, if you have a project to work on together or just to say hello. Feel free to contact me and I will get back to you.
contact.subSend: Fill out the form below to get in touch with me.
